column1: Sơn La (listen) is a city in the north-west region of Vietnam. It is the capital of Sơn La Province.
In the era of the Sip Song Chau Tai
column2: Sơn La was a fort of the Black Tai.
Sơn La has a dry-winter humid subtropical climate (Köppen climate classification: Cwa)
column3: affected by the East Asian monsoons.
